name: Chicken Chasseur
ingredients: chicken thighs, tomatoes, mushrooms, shallots, white wine, chicken broth, tarragon, parsley, butter, flour, salt, pepper
quantities: 2 lbs chicken thighs, 2 cups chopped tomatoes, 10 oz mushrooms, 6-8 shallots, 1 cup white wine, 1 cup chicken broth, 2-3 sprigs tarragon, fresh parsley for garnish, 2 tbsp butter, 2 tbsp flour, salt and pepper to taste
recipe:
1. Brown 2 lbs chicken thighs in 2 tbsp butter. Remove and set aside.
2. Saut√© 6-8 chopped shallots and 10 oz sliced mushrooms until soft.
3. Add 2 cups chopped tomatoes and 1 cup white wine, deglaze the pan.
4. Add 1 cup chicken broth and 2-3 sprigs tarragon, then simmer.
5. Return chicken to the pan and cook until chicken is cooked through.
6. Season with salt and pepper, garnish with fresh parsley, and serve.
